definition: to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: It will be my fifth time to take it.
sentences.chinese: 这将是我第五次考路考。

sentences.english: I passed the road-test the first time I took the exam.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次进行路考就通过了。

sentences.english: That means I can take the last exam on next week.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，这就意味着下周能参加路考了。

sentences.english: This is her second attempt at the driving test.
How did I pass my US driving road test? Step by step.
sentences.chinese: 以下是我如何通过美国驾照的路考的。

sentences.english: She managed to pass her driving test after months of practice.
sentences.chinese: 经过几个月的练习，她总算通过了路考。

definition: to sit for a makeup exam/to resit an exam/makeup exam/resit
driving school/abbr. for 駕駛學校|驾驶学校
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
an examiner/an official conducting an exam
